quoteText: Contests, Surveys and Sweepstakes Data This personal data is used to allow you to sign up and participate in these types of promotions. The exact personal data collected will vary depending on the promotion.
title: Spotify may merge your current personal info with more if you participate in a Special Promotion

tosdr.case: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
tosdr.tldr: If you participate in a Special Promotion (sweepstakes, contests, surveys), Spotify may ask for certain personal information in addition to what they already have. They may then combine that information with your current file.
